title: Advise on S-Corp Election
description: The owner of a profitable LLC wants to know if electing to be taxed as an S-Corporation would save them money on self-employment taxes.

tasks.description: Analyze the LLC's net income and the owner's current tax situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the business's profitability and the owner's financial picture.

tasks.description: Determine a reasonable salary for the owner if they were an S-Corp employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent researches and sets a reasonable compensation figure.

tasks.description: Compare the total tax liability (income + payroll) as an LLC vs. an S-Corp and provide a recommendation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a comparative analysis showing potential tax savings and advises the client.
